          <title>
            <string language="en">Magma and the Earth's crust</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magma und die Kruste der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Magma et la croûte de terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Magma e a crosta de terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Magma e la crosta terrestre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάγμα και η γήινη κρούστα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Magma y la corteza de tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows magma pushing up into the crust while slowly being cooled.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">igneous rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molten rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Magma, das in die Kruste
beim langsam abgekühlt werden hochdrückt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le magma soulevant dans 
la croûte tout en lentement étant refroidi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o magma que levanta na 
crosta ao lentamente ser refrigerado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il magma che spinge 
verso l'alto nella crosta mentre lentamente è raffreddata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μάγμα που ωθεί επάνω 
στην κρούστα αργά δροσιμένος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el magma que empuja 
hacia arriba en la corteza mientras que lentamente siendo refrescado.</string>
          </description>
